option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<!-- Top: info + move list + controls (top half) --> <LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:padding="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvGameInfo" android:text="@string/white_to_move" android:textSize="16sp" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:paddingTop="8dp" android:paddingBottom="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvMoves" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="monospace" android:text="" android:textSize="14sp" android:padding="4dp" /> </ScrollView>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnResign" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/btnResgin" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<!-- New: Post-game controls (hidden by default from code) --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/post_game_buttons" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:visibility="gone">
<Button android:id="@+id/btnPlayAgain" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/btnPlayAgain" />
<View android:layout_width="8dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnMainMenu" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/btnMainMenu" /> </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Bottom: board area (bottom half) --> <FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1.5" android:padding="8dp">
<com.chesskel.ui.game.ChessBoardView android:id="@+id/chessBoard" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_gravity="center" /> </FrameLayout> </LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<!-- Top: info + move list + controls (top half) --> <LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:padding="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvGameInfo" android:text="@string/white_to_move" android:textSize="16sp" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:paddingTop="8dp" android:paddingBottom="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvMoves" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="monospace" android:text="" android:textSize="14sp" android:padding="4dp" /> </ScrollView>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnResign" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/btnResgin" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<!-- New: Post-game controls (hidden by default from code) --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/post_game_buttons" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:visibility="gone">
<Button android:id="@+id/btnPlayAgain" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/btnPlayAgain" />
<View android:layout_width="8dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnMainMenu" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/btnMainMenu" /> </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Bottom: board area (bottom half) --> <FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1.5" android:padding="8dp">
<com.chesskel.ui.game.ChessBoardView android:id="@+id/chessBoard" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_gravity="center" /> </FrameLayout> </LinearLayout>
